phrases: I will get you something, too.
We did not have our hot pot.
I am unemployed for two months.
I am really just so sorry.
We might believe them to be eternity
The impulse eats away at me
Can I... Can I... Can I... Who am I...?
If my human tears have dried
What will you think of me?
I wonder if she is there yet.
I have not seen you since winter break started!
You do not give me any attention anymore.
I assume this means you have a man?
Oh, but... W-we are not exactly dating...
Yeah, but from the look on your face, I am guessing it is going pretty well!
Last I heard, men totally freaked you out.
He is not very friendly, and he often gets angry with me.
But he is really very nice,
and he is willing to admit when he is wrong.
Oh, and he can jump really high!
Is he in track and field or something?
Um, no, but... something like that?
And... I met him on the way home one night...
He is been coming over after work.
I will make dinner and we will eat together.
You let him in your house and feed him dinner?
Are you sure that is a good idea?
I think I can trust him.
W-well, if you are that sure, then I guess...
I house this filthy devil inside me, and I...
I act like I am some knight in shining armor.
Come see me sometime after New Year's.
It is almost time for your physical.
Oh, and Sakaki's hosting his usual New Year's party at the bar.
I got a wife and kids, so I will not be there, but all the singles should be.
Check it out if you feel like it.
I am feeling kind of out of it.
Is it because I did not get any sleep last night?
Hot pot with Anzai on New Year's Eve?
J-just thinking about it makes me blush!
Alright, Miss, I am in a hurry, so...!
Oh, you went to the store already?
Oh, it is just, your face looks kind of red...
Do not worry, it is not a cold.
You do not want too much snow.
Then you have to shovel it.
Oh, but I guess it does not snow that much in Tokyo.
Authorities are still on the lookout for a man who disappeared
Restaurant Murder, Man Goes Missing after a stabbing at a restaurant earlier today.
According to the manager who found the body...
Oh no, did not you want to go home for New Year's?
D-did I ask something I should not have?
Stab wounds were found in multiple places on the victim's body,
Could be the work of a devil.
Stab wounds were found in multiple places on the victim's body,
Could be the work of a devil.
and it is believed that loss of blood was the direct because of death.
and it is believed that loss of blood was the direct because of death.
Vampires tend to stab their victims after a kill, to hide any signs that they drank the blood.
I think I would suspect the missing man.
Right, because if he is missing, that means he ran away.
We cannot say for sure, though.
If the fugitive really is a devil, he may be around here by now.
But that restaurant is pretty far away.
That reminds me, did you know that guy at the store?
But he picked up my vegetables.
Picking up vegetables makes you a good person?
Oh, but maybe he did look kind of like a vampire.
That makes him even more dangerous!
No, I mean he had dark circles under his eyes.
I do not think he had drunk any blood.
But you did not know the man.
I cannot believe I have to work on New Year's Eve.
Well, when the person of interest is a devil...
Of course, we are still waiting for the autopsy results.
One of my employees, Katagiri, he is a vampire!
He is the guy that did it!
Get out there and arrest him!
And you are Mr. Okino, the manager, right?
We do not know for sure who did it yet.
She had no blood in her body, right?
It had to be a vampire!
Why is it that I smell blood coming from your entire body?
My sense of smell is a little better than average.
Humans only reek this badly of blood when they have been drenched in someone else's.
Sawazaki, is there a wanted devil on the loose?
Yeah, the suspect in the restaurant stabbing.
But it looks like he was framed.
The killer made it look like a devil did it, by causing massive blood loss.
I have not identified him yet,
but there is a devil nearby who seems to be running from-
We will send a car to get him.
Is your boyfriend a devil, too?
But you are spending New Year's Eve together!
I have a question for you.
If you were framed, you should not need to run.
So why did you come all the way out here?
Give me an honest answer, and you can have some food.
If we get in a little fight, we might end up beating the other guy half to death.
Once I hit a man and he started bleeding.
I hated that man, but I sucked his blood.
So I made up my mind.
I will never hurt a human again,
and if I feel like I might, I get out of there.
The murder victim was a nice girl.
She was the only one there who treated me like a human being.
I refuse to become a devil.
Well, she beat me in chest-size.
The hell I would go to her place.
That woman looked like a Hollywood movie star.
That was just... you know, one-sided.
You bought too much to drink.
Some of that is for you, you know.
I was jealous of that beautiful woman.
And... and I did not even know your first name, Anzai.
Always doing things like this in my dreams.
But I know I am nowhere near good enough for him.
Your face is redder than before.
I am the one who is pathetic.
I could tell she was not feeling well, but I ignored it, and now look at her.
I am here looking at the holiday lights at Sapporo Odori Park.
The place is packed with visitors waiting for the big countdown.
The place is packed with visitors waiting for the big countdown.
I would like to go there someday.
The place is packed with visitors waiting for the big countdown.
I need to get myself a sedative.
Shot through the head with a 7.62mm bullet.
This is the fifth one now.
You saw the blood and did not transform.
Which means this one is not human, either?
Cannot you be gentlemanly enough to ask if I am okay...
Last night's victim makes five in this series of shootings.
All with a single shot to the head.
And the victims are all devils.
But not one of them was in a transformed state when they died.
They looked just like normal humans.
So the killer knew they were devils?
then how did the shooter know the victims were devils?
That information is exclusive to city halls, insurance companies, hospitals, and the police.
There are some devil dating sites, but...
You got a date or something, Yuuki?
How far have you gone with her, anyway?
Do you have to broadcast your stupid questions?
Come on, I really want to know.
How does one go about dating a human woman?
The sight of blood arouses you,
and when you are aroused, you want to see more blood.
You cannot even feel her up without being very careful.
And quit it with the hands!
You know it is driving you crazy.
I would be happy to help you... let off some steam.
Do you know why I asked Anzai here, even though he is suspended?
If there is a list of devils going around, then either of you could be the next target.
I am saying I do not have time to babysit you.
They are like children, are not they?
I thought I might find my patient here.
I will take my physical another time.
I did not forget, I promise.
I told you to see me after New Year's.
And I bet you are running low on sedatives, too.
You should not be going through them that fast!
So when are you coming, Anzai?!
So what is the devil population, anyway?
That is about the percentage here in Japan.
And now that sex between humans and devils is legal,
I am guessing we will be seeing even fewer purebloods.
You could let Yanagi watch, then you can screw your girlfriend!
Get your mind out of the gutter!
I still have not gotten her that Christmas present.
You can see your girlfriend if you want,
but hold off on the jumping telephone poles for a while.
I know how you like jumping.
Pretty good idea, if I do say so myself.
I think he should be getting home soon.
Why would I say it that way?
And you are sure you can trust this guy?
Well, I am worried about you!
You had virtually no interest in men before now.
And you have not known him that long, right?
You cannot be too careful, okay?
If anything happens, talk to me.
It is like she is my mom.
We have not known each other that long.
I only met him two months ago.
I am not even his girlfriend.
And I feel like I hardly know him.
I wonder why he keeps coming to my apartment.
Anzai always comes in through the balcony, so...
B-but why are you at my front door?
We are having cabbage rolls today.
I tweaked the recipe, and I think it will be good.
No, yours is just too cold.
But something seems... different about you.
Oh, I... I did put on some makeup.
The next one gets your head, monster.
I am going to be fine.
How long were they after me?
Never mind that... why were they after me?
I know it is late, but Merry Christmas.
Do not touch me, you monster!
You pretend to care just long enough to get your chance to drink our blood!
My mother died because of you!
If you devils never existed, she would still be alive!
That is why I kill you!
To make sure you never kill again!
If we could have loved each other more like that
What could I have told you?
A chance encounter that cannot amount to love
Because this filthy form is who I am
Are these fingers trembling as they touch you?
It is a story of fighting together
I want to protect you without hurting you
It is a story of desiring forever
Against the urges surging up inside me
Like we are softly melting away...
You are weaker than I thought.
